attributes.action: Not allow our children to go through testing for covid-19 every week
attributes.additional_details: Any child will find it difficult to allow people to test them, children on the spectrum or with any additional needs are going to struggle, I feel this will give any child nightmares and is an invasion of their space
attributes.background: To stop the weekly testing of covid-19 on our children

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, as there are no weekly tests of children. You can find the Government's guidance here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-implementing-protective-measures-in-education-and-childcare-settings/coronavirus-covid-19-implementing-protective-measures-in-education-and-childcare-settings
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
